basics.name: Jordan Banasik
basics.label: Systems Engineer
basics.summary: Jordan is from Houston, Texas, currently residing in Seattle, Washington. His work focuses on simplifying and automating processes to both reduce complexity and increase performance of deployments, beginning at application stack and ending at client access to the application.

work.name: Insight Global
work.summary: Big 4 accounting firm contracted for supporting and deploying a global scale application and related resources
highlights: Perform code deployments using Azure DevOps
Maintenance on existing hosts for patches, reboots, etc
Ticket queue triaging and customer guidance for basic issues
Reporting issues experienced with the platform by customers to help facilitate faster recognition of issues

work.name: AWS
work.summary: Write, deploy, and maintain custom tools for other teams of the IAM branch in AWS
highlights: IaC in Ruby for a custom CI/CD pipeline system used internally at AWS
Wrote tools to provide useful features to other teams, helping speed up their daily workflows
Pipeline optimization and maintenance for other teams
Perform oncall work including working priority issues and handling service outages

work.name: cPanel
work.description: Administration and maintainence of internal tools
work.summary: Internal systems administration to provide tools and resources for the company to perform their duties
highlights: Perform server maintenance such as OS updates, certificate updates, software updates
Helped initiate a move from standard virtual machine usage to dockerized applications, including adding CI/CD automation for easier updates
Installed and deployed new servers to their North Houston datacenter

work.name: cPanel
work.description: Administration and maintainence of internal tools
work.summary: Provide cPanel customer support and report bugs to the development team
highlights: Handle various forms of incoming tickets from external customers reporting issues or facing problems with usage of cPanel/WHM technologies
Report bugs via Jira, sometimes including a patch in situations where the Perl scripts were uncompiled, directly ran scripts
Help with licensing issues and server setup, including providing hardware recommendations
Assist with configuration of more advanced features

work.name: HostGator
work.description: Migration and reconfiguration of web software from external hosts to customer's hosting plans with HostGator
highlights: Perform migrations of customer data to our servers
Reconfiguration of migrated software and the hosting server to ensure it will function within our environment
Assist with more complex migrations either due to older hosts without easy data retrieval or software misconfiguration issues

work.name: HostGator
work.description: Phone and chat based technical support for webhosting plans

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.
highlights: Awarded 'Teacher of the Month'

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.

projects.name: Miss Direction
projects.description: A mapping engine that misguides you
highlights: Won award at AIHacks 2016
Built by all women team of newbie programmers
Using modern technologies such as GoogleMaps, Chrome Extension and Javascript
